p: Within the 5–10 min DT fraction, the highest concentration had eucalyptol (19.0%), followed by α-terpineol (8.4%) and terpinen-4-ol (5.4%). Eucalyptol is important and a very popular compound that has been used in a number of ways. Eucalyptol was shown to control airway mucus hypersecretion and asthma via anti-inflammatory cytokine inhibition, it is used in the treatment of nonpurulent rhinosinusitis, it may reduce inflammation and pain when applied topically, and it may enhance skin permeation of bio-affecting agents [ 44, 45].
